issue.title: Update walking script to use new IHMC messages

content.raw:
Here's the error I get when trying to walk with the latest ihmc code (built from source in a catkin workspace, not from debs):

~~~
[INFO] [WallTime: 1487805966.439239] [46.390000] Walking forward
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "keyboard_teleop.py", line 560, in <module>
    teleop.run()
  File "keyboard_teleop.py", line 108, in run
    self.process_key(ch)
  File "keyboard_teleop.py", line 282, in process_key
    self.process_walking_command(self.WALKING_BINDINGS[ch.lower()], ch)
  File "keyboard_teleop.py", line 326, in process_walking_command
    self.translate([self.TRANS_STEP * direction, 0.0, 0.0])
  File "keyboard_teleop.py", line 464, in translate
    msg = self.getTranslationFootstepMsg(offset)
  File "keyboard_teleop.py", line 438, in getTranslationFootstepMsg
    msg = self.getEmptyFootsetListMsg()
  File "keyboard_teleop.py", line 431, in getEmptyFootsetListMsg
    msg.transfer_time = 1.5
AttributeError: 'FootstepDataListRosMessage' object has no attribute 'transfer_time'
~~~
content.html:
Here's the error I get when trying to walk with the latest ihmc code (built from source in a catkin workspace, not from debs):

[INFO] [WallTime: 1487805966.439239] [46.390000] Walking forward
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "keyboard_teleop.py", line 560, in <module>
    teleop.run()
  File "keyboard_teleop.py", line 108, in run
    self.process_key(ch)
  File "keyboard_teleop.py", line 282, in process_key
    self.process_walking_command(self.WALKING_BINDINGS[ch.lower()], ch)
  File "keyboard_teleop.py", line 326, in process_walking_command
    self.translate([self.TRANS_STEP * direction, 0.0, 0.0])
  File "keyboard_teleop.py", line 464, in translate
    msg = self.getTranslationFootstepMsg(offset)
  File "keyboard_teleop.py", line 438, in getTranslationFootstepMsg
    msg = self.getEmptyFootsetListMsg()
  File "keyboard_teleop.py", line 431, in getEmptyFootsetListMsg
    msg.transfer_time = 1.5
AttributeError: 'FootstepDataListRosMessage' object has no attribute 'transfer_time'
